name: Generic Bird Game
description:
How to play
  • SPACE or click to jump
  • ESCAPE to return to the start screen
  • Fly through the pipes without hitting them
  • Try to get a higher score!
What is this?

A one of a kind game made by me! It's just a 3D flappy bird clone... though quite a good one if you ask me!

You play as a yellow sphere (in first person) and your goal is to fly your way through the pipes endlessly. Sounds fun doesn't it? 

Try to beat my high score of 179!

More updates to hopefully come! I plan to add a third person mode soon!
